channel.title: Expansive Packs on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Expansive Packs on ZooBerry

item.title: Jungle Escape
item.description: Add an UXP containing several birds from different tropical regions. Objects fit perfectly with the default jungle theme.

item.title: Endless Ocean: Luminous
item.description: A pack containing a plethora of aquatic animals created by Buffzoo, majorgalah, and gamevideosforlife.

item.title: Island Excursions
item.description: Embark upon an excursion to travel the oceans in search of tropical paradise! Discover the isles hiding within the Hawaiian Islands and Papua New Guinea, seeing such animals as the Hawaiian Monk Seal and the Northern Cassowary as they live in their lush and vibrant homes.

item.title: Bog Pack
item.description: A Bog Pack made by Hendrix with new animals, objects, and a new biome.

item.title: Alpine Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Boreal Forest Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Desert Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Grassland Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Savannah Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Scrub Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Temperate Forest Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Tundra Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Japanese Macaque Pack
item.description: Japanese macaques range through the forested mountains and highlands of Japan.

item.title: Vicuña Pack
item.description: Vicuñas are found in semiarid rolling grasslands and plains at altitudes of 3,500-5,750 meters.

item.title: American Alligator Pack
item.description: American alligators are usually found in freshwater swamps, marshes, rivers, lakes, and occasionally smaller bodies of water.

item.title: Ganges River Dolphin Pack
item.description: The Ganges river dolphin lives in the muddy waters of the Ganges, Brahmaputra, Meghna, Karnaphuli, and Hoogly river systems.

item.title: Dorcas Gazelle and Adonis Dentata
item.description: The dorcas gazelle is highly adapted to the desert. They can go their entire lives without drinking.

item.title: Painted Reed Frog Pack
item.description: A pack containing a wetlands mushroom, a painted reed frog and an information board.

item.title: Fire Pack
item.description: From the hidden island of Drom emerges mythical beasts of fire.

item.title: Amur Leopard Mini Pack
item.description: The Amur leopard is one of nine recognised subspecies of leopard.

item.title: The Christmas Pack
item.description: Merry Christmas! The Christmas Pack is a collection of mods for Zoo Tycoon 2 that expound a winter theme.

item.title: The Christmas Pack 2: 7 Reasons to Celebrate
item.description: Merry Christmas! The Christmas Pack - 7 Reasons to Celebrate is the sequel to the collection of mods for Zoo Tycoon 2 that expound a winter theme.

item.title: Charming Cretaceous
item.description: A pack containing 15 Cretaceous era, JPOG styled dinosaurs.

item.title: Zoo Tycoon 2: Operation Genesis - Part 1
item.description: A pack containing various buildings, scenery and foliage imported from JPOG.

item.title: AVES
item.description: An expansive user-made expansion pack made by the ZT ABC Team!

item.title: European Expeditions [Realistic]
item.description: A user-made expansion pack made by Hendrix!

item.title: REPTILIA
item.description: Reptilia is a new expansion pack made by ZT ABC!

item.title: Arabia Pack
item.description: A Pack containing four Arabian animals and Plants.
